front.title: Perimeter Scan
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to glance at any one card which is face-down at a location. OR Use 1 Force to glance at opponent's hand. You may move each droid spy and Infantry Mine you find there to opponent's Used Pile. OR Cancel Probe Telemetry.
front.lore: 'It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here.'

combo: Perimeter Scan + Wyron Serper Add 2 to the destiny of this card.
